'''The Green Lady''' is a character in {{poe2}}.  

## Background

The Green Lady is the mistress of the island, a guardian of its adra and an ancient creature whose memory reaches all the way back to Ondra's cataclysm that engulfed the Deadfire. Restored by the Watcher's hands, she decided to restore Motare o Kozi to its glory.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved = [The Last Sanctuary](/theLastSanctuary/)
|none            = 
|other           =
}}

## =Quests

=
* [The Last Sanctuary](/theLastSanctuary/) - If you heal the grove, [The Rotted Lady](/theRottedLady/) will transform into The Green Lady.

[Category:Motare o Kōzi characters](/categoryMotareOKoziCharacters/)
